segments.text: Just remember . The main thing right now is to make sure Stars.com is happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . You're right . But she's just evil . Someone should drive a stake through her heart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Elvin , please . Can I count on you to keep your cool for a week , or not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm OK . I'll be fine . I'v cool . I'm cold . I'm like ice . She won't know what hit her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , how's the nose ? Boy , that must have hurt .
segments.speaker: S1
